intro: Psychotria agostinii, commonly known as the Agostini psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. This plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in the undergrowth of rainforests. The plant is notable for its role in the ecological interactions of its habitat, including its association with specific pollinators.
